Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: {? | $(this.trait:corpse) |corpse of a }{? | $(this.trait:variation) | $(this.trait:variation) }great white shark

A large, predatory, saltwater fish spanning approximately twenty feet in length. It boasts countershading along it's streamlined, torpedo-shaped body, and sports a robust conical snout, a set of beady, black eyes, three main fins, and a large, fear-inspiring mouth filled to the brim with serrated teeth.{? | $(this.trait:corpse) | This magnificent beast of waters is dead.}{? | $(this.trait:meat) | All edible parts of the body have been removed.} {? | $(this.trait:teeth) | Some of the shark's teeth are gone missing too.} {? | $(this.trait:skinned) | The precious skin of the shark has also been removed.}

A large, predatory fish spanning approximately twenty feet in length. It's body displays countershading, giving it a mottled appearance.{? | $(this.trait:corpse) | This magnificent beast of waters is dead.}
the torpedo-shaped body of the great white shark

The body of the great white shark is streamlined and torpedo-shaped, enabling it to easily swim through the water. It features three main fins; one dorsal, one caudal, and a pair of pectoral fins which aid it in maneuvering.{? | $(this.trait:meat) | Most of the meat has been cut off from the shark.}
The body of the great white shark is streamlined and torpedo-shaped, enabling it to easily swim through the water.
the countershading on the great white shark

The torpedo-shaped body of the great white shark displays countershading, in which the fish has a white underside and a grey dorsal area. This mottled coloration acts as a deterrent against prey by making the shark's outline blend with the sea from above the water, while exposing a minimal silhouette of sunlight from below the water.
The torpedo-shaped body of the great white shark displays a white underside and a grey dorsal area, giving the fish a mottled appearance.
the great white shark's {? | $(this.trait:corpse) |lifeless, }beady, black eyes
A set of {? | $(this.trait:corpse) |lifeless, }beady, black eyes sit above, and on either side of, the great white shark's robust, conical snout, enabling it to see.
A set of {? | $(this.trait:corpse) |lifeless, }beady, black eyes sit above, and on either side of, the great white shark's robust, conical snout.
the great white shark's caudal fin
A crescent-shaped caudal fin trails from the back end of the great white shark's torpedo-shaped body, assisting it with movement through the water.
A crescent-shaped caudal fin trails from the back end of the great white shark's torpedo-shaped body.
the great white shark's dorsal fin
A semi-triangular shaped dorsal fin juts upward from the mid-back of the great white shark's torpedo-shaped body to poke above the surface of the water.
A semi-triangular shaped dorsal fin juts upward from the mid-back of the great white shark's torpedo-shaped body to poke above the surface of the water.
the great white shark's pectoral fins
A pair of pectoral fins hang from the front sides of the great white shark's torpedo-shaped body. They aid the fish in general maneuverings and assist with balance.
A pair of pectoral fins hang from the front sides of the great white shark's torpedo-shaped body.
the great white shark's large mouth
A large, fear inspiring mouth filled to the brim with three rows of sharp, serrated teeth.
A large, fear inspiring mouth filled to the brim with sharp, serrated teeth.
the great white shark's robust, conical snout
A robust and large, conical snout protrudes from the menacing face of the great white shark.
A robust, conical snout protrudes from the face of the great white shark.
the great white shark's serrated teeth

Three rows of sharp, serrated teeth fill the large mouth of the great white shark. As teeth are lost, worn, or broken down, they rotate and are replaced by new ones, so a sharp bite is always ensured. {? | $(this.trait:teeth) | Many of the teeth have been forcibly removed from this once magnificent creature.}
Three rows of sharp, serrated teeth fill the large mouth of the great white shark.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "A small spot appears in the distance, getting closer and closer, until a shape of a fish swimming along the ship takes form. A shark! A great white shark! Though the great isn't exactly fitting, this seem to be in adolescence yet."
"Somehow the small shark managed to swim out of your reach, and startled by the overpowering force, escapes the scene."
